name: Datalign Limited
goal: Datalign Ltd is proposing an administrative platform for the state which impedes shadow economic activity, raises substantial additional tax revenues and delivers a fully integrated framework for efficient state wide electronic governance and reform. The system known as the State Interface is designed as a stand-alone system which can be deployed in any jurisdiction with the same positive reform impacts and efficiency gains in every jurisdiction.
interests: Budget, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Datalign is seeking to engage EU institutions to assess the proposal for viability and to advance the matter to Commissioner level for their consideration of the State Interface as a unique and strategic solution to the structural issues afflicting the European Union.
